name: AV International
overview:
Incorporated in the year 2000, at Jhajjar, (Haryana, India), we, “A. V. International,” are a well-known entity engaged in manufacturing, exporting and supplying of an exclusive range of Shoe Leather, Wet Blue Leather and Finished Leather.

Our Product Range /: Our offered range includes Leather Jacket, Wet Blue Leather, Shoe Leather, Leather Footwear, Finished Leather, etc.

Our Quality Assurance: Our capability to offer a quality product range consistently and our precise effective services make us a reputed firm in the market. We procure our raw material from a trusted vendor base, and our manufacturing unit in turn uses this quality raw material to manufacture the products.

Why Us ?: We have vast industry experience in the production process of Shoe Leather, Wet Blue Leather and Finished Leather.

Client Satisfaction: Our clients are the base of our business and their satisfaction is the basic mantra for our success in the industry. Our presence in the industry for these many years has made it possible for us to understand the requirements of clients.

Our Infrastructure: Our organization is assisted by our well developed sophisticated infrastructure that is constructed over a wide area.
